column4: For a year I have had 3 external USB hardrives plugged into my computer. 5 hours ago all were working. Now as of 1 hour ago the computer is saying that only 2 of them are there. it isn't just saying the 1 isn't mounted, it is not seeing it at all. I have unplugged & replugged it, on both sides several times, unplugged the power, let it sit & replugged it is. The drive spins up, but then does't talk with the PC, and lsusb & fdisk -l does n
ot see it, & I do not have any other systems to test it on.
well..it looks like your USB-drive is dead
Thanks ne2k: Thanks Anchor: Doesn't hurt to ask for second & third & fourth opinnions
